description: First floor side and rear extension; and single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing number:

Location Plan and Block Plan ref. 003-2019-PA-VJ-OS rev C; Existing Floor Plans ref. 003-2019-PA-VJ-001 rev C; Existing Elevations ref. 003-2019-PA-VJ-002 rev C; Proposed Floor Plans ref. 003-2019-PA-VJ-003 rev C; Proposed Elevations ref. 003-2019-PA-VJ-004 rev C.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2018).
| No part of the roof of the single storey projection to the rear shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4, and 7.B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); and National Planning Policy Framework (2018).
| The new bathroom window on the side elevation shall be obscure glazed at all times.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4, and 7.B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); and National Planning Policy Framework (2018).
